zapaddon.name: OpenAPI Support
zapaddon.description: Imports and spiders Open API definitions.
zapaddon.author: ZAP Core Team plus Joanna Bona, Artur Grzesica, Michal Materniak and Marcin Spiewak
zapaddon.changes:
Support optional host override.
Detect and warn on potential loops.
Allow add-on to be unloaded dynamically.
Support user specified values when importing (Issue 3344).
Support older swagger formats (Issue 3598).
